name: BATTLE DOT EXE
description:
A Mecha Fighting game on the GameBoy Color? Since when?!

BATTLE DOT EXE is a fighting game in the form of a shoot-em-up. Currently the game has 1 enemy class and AI type, being a normal class Chaser

In the future, more features will be added. Some of these things include:

  • More AIs and stat classes to fight
  • A timer to limit battles to 60 seconds
  • A custom battle mode, where you can battle any class and AI combination
  • A reflector ability, which allows you to reflect attacks back at your opponents
  • Multiple rounds
  • Link Cable support? (Really depends on if it ever gets added to GB Studio)
  • Multiple controllable machines
  • And last but not least, a story mode.
